per_case.actual_output: Machine Learning, a subset of Artificial Intelligence, enables systems to learn patterns from data without explicit programming. Machine learning uses statistical methods. It involves training models on data. The process includes feature extraction and model selection.

per_case.actual_output: RAG stands for Rapid Adaptive Guidance, a subset of artificial intelligence that enables systems to learn patterns from data without explicit programming.
per_case.expected_output: Retrieval-Augmented Generation combines retrieval with language models
retrieval_context: Machine learning is a subset of artificial intelligence that enables systems to learn patterns from data without explicit programming.
Buffer overflow causes RAG faults. Memory RAG errors crash systems. RAG allocation fails when RAM exhausted. RAG segmentation faults indicate pointer issues.
